metadata.title: CVE-2016-9856 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: An XSS issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin because of an improper fix forCVE-2016-2559 in PMASA-2016-10. This issue is resolved by using a copy of ahash to avoid a race condition. All 4.6.x versions (prior to 4.6.5), 4.4.xversions (prior to 4.4.15.9), and 4.0.x versions (prior to 4.0.10.18) areaffected.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
